titles.title: Tax Incentives for Family-Friendly Workplaces Act of 1996

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a small business family and medical leave credit and a credit for wages paid to employees who are allowed to shift hours of employment or work at home in order to reduce child care needs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/17/1996--Introduced. Tax Incentives for Family-Friendly Workplaces Act of 1996 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a small business family and medical leave credit and a credit for wages paid to employees who are permitted to shift employment hours or to work at home in order to reduce child care needs.
